      double[] DagData.smooth(DagData d, double[] zIn)
      This utility will apply a Laplassian smoother to to a field defined by a zIn array - the smoothing kernel is the set of points in Voronoi diagram associated with the data point after the mean value for the Delaunay have been calculated.
